t: To the chief Musician{H5329}{H8764)}, A Psalm{H4210} for the sons{H1121} of Korah{H7141}. LORD{H3068}, thou hast been favourable{H7521}{H8804)} unto thy land{H776}: thou hast brought back{H7725}{H8804)} the captivity{H7622}{H8675)}{H7622} of Jacob{H3290}.
Thou hast forgiven{H5375}{H8804)} the iniquity{H5771} of thy people{H5971}, thou hast covered{H3680}{H8765)} all their sin{H2403}. Selah{H5542}.
Thou hast taken away{H622}{H8804)} all thy wrath{H5678}: thou hast turned{H7725}{H8689)} thyself from the fierceness{H2740} of thine anger{H639}.
Turn{H7725}{H8798)} us, O God{H430} of our salvation{H3468}, and cause thine anger{H3708} toward us to cease{H6565}{H8685)}.
Wilt thou be angry{H599}{H8799)} with us for ever{H5769}? wilt thou draw out{H4900}{H8799)} thine anger{H639} to all{H1755} generations{H1755}?
Wilt thou not revive{H2421}{H8762)} us again{H7725}{H8799)}: that thy people{H5971} may rejoice{H8055}{H8799)} in thee?
Shew{H7200}{H8685)} us thy mercy{H2617}, O LORD{H3068}, and grant{H5414}{H8799)} us thy salvation{H3468}.

I will hear{H8085}{H8799)} what God{H410} the LORD{H3068} will speak{H1696}{H8762)}: for he will speak{H1696}{H8762)} peace{H7965} unto his people{H5971}, and to his saints{H2623}: but let them not turn again{H7725}{H8799)} to folly{H3690}.
Surely his salvation{H3468} is nigh{H7138} them that fear{H3373} him; that glory{H3519} may dwell{H7931}{H8800)} in our land{H776}.
Mercy{H2617} and truth{H571} are met together{H6298}{H8738)}; righteousness{H6664} and peace{H7965} have kissed{H5401}{H8804)} each other.
Truth{H571} shall spring out{H6779}{H8799)} of the earth{H776}; and righteousness{H6664} shall look down{H8259}{H8738)} from heaven{H8064}.
Yea, the LORD{H3068} shall give{H5414}{H8799)} that which is good{H2896}; and our land{H776} shall yield{H5414}{H8799)} her increase{H2981}.
Righteousness{H6664} shall go{H1980}{H8762)} before{H6440} him; and shall set{H7760}{H8799)} us in the way{H1870} of his steps{H6471}.
